hero.description: We are TINCADIA, a company focused on inclusive technology, accessibility, disability, and artificial intelligence. We are dedicated to promoting social inclusion for people with hearing impairments and other disabilities in strategic sectors, through innovative solutions that foster equal opportunities. Additionally, we seek to connect companies and establish alliances between diverse sectors, eliminating barriers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers.

questions.question: How does Tincadia ensure interpreter quality?
questions.answer: All our interpreters go through a rigorous verification process including certification validation (ILSE, FESORD), practical interpretation tests, and continuous quality evaluations. Additionally, we have a rating and user feedback system that allows us to maintain the highest service standards.

questions.question: Are my data safe on the platform?
questions.answer: Your data security is our priority. We use end-to-end encryption, comply with data protection regulations (GDPR, LOPD), and conduct periodic security audits. Your personal data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

questions.question: What is the cost of service for deaf people?
questions.answer: We offer different plans adapted to each need. The Basic Plan is free and includes essential features like voice-to-text transcription and automatic translation. Professional and Premium plans offer advanced features with competitive pricing and flexible payment options.

questions.question: How are companies selected for the job board?
questions.answer: Companies go through a validation process verifying their real commitment to inclusion. We evaluate their accessibility policies, organizational culture, and previous experience with diverse talent. Only companies certified as inclusive can publish offers on our platform.

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: TINCADIA is a technological platform (mobile and web) designed to facilitate communication, accessibility, and inclusion for people with hearing impairments and other disabilities, as well as to support organizations and companies in providing accessible care. The services have a technological and assistive purpose and in no case replace medical, therapeutic, legal, educational services, or professional human interpretation of Sign Language (LS).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy and Personal Data Treatment

purposes.title: 1. Purposes of Treatment
purposes.intro: We will process your personal data, with your authorization, to:
items: Provide, operate, maintain, and improve our accessibility services (transcription, LS avatars, etc.).
Execute and train Artificial Intelligence algorithms, applying anonymization or pseudonymization techniques to protect your identity.
Manage your account, provide technical support, and attend to your requests.
Comply with legal, regulatory, and contractual obligations.
Perform anonymous statistical analysis for continuous improvement.

prohibition.title: EXPRESS PROHIBITION:
prohibition.content: TINCADIA will NOT commercialize (sell, rent, or trade) your sensitive personal data.

rights.title: 2. Rights of the Holder
items: Know, access, rectify, and update your data.
Request proof of authorization.
Revoke authorization and/or request deletion of your data.
File complaints with the Superintendence of Industry and Commerce (SIC).

security.title: 3. Security and Transfers
security.content: We implement technical and administrative measures to protect your data. We may share them with technology providers and strategic allies (national or international), who will be contractually obligated to maintain the highest standards of security and confidentiality, in accordance with Law 1581 of 2012 and Decree 1377 of 2013.

retention.title: 4. Data Retention
retention.content: We will retain your personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Policy, or for the period required by legal or contractual obligations. Subsequently, we will proceed to its secure deletion.

modifications.title: 5. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this Policy. Changes will be published on the Platform with the date of the last update.
